video.title: "Oneness" - A Meditation - Sujatha Maheshwari - Non-duality
video.description:
These beautiful, clear and profound pointers to the Truth were written as a poem by Sujatha Maheshwari, a regular listener of this channel and devotee of Bhagavan Ramana Maharshi.

With thanks for her kind permission to recreate them in this format for meditation purposes.
Song - Om Varanam Namah
Artist - Vicki Hansen
Full track can be purchased here: https://music.apple.com/album/1434705796?app=itunes&ls=1

 Here is the full text of the poem below:

Oneness
~~~~~~~

All thoughts ... all feelings ... 
All of the sensations that arise in the body ...
All experience ... all emotion ...

Without labels ...
Without judgment ... of good or bad, of right or wrong ...
Without even likes or dislikes or preferences ...

Without identification with an illusory sense of "I" ...

All of the energy that appears in the consciousness ...
Is simply ... energy ...

Without innate substance or being,
Recognized in its sameness ...

And thus, in its inherent 
Emptiness ...
& Purity ... 
Clear, like the sky.

And just like that ... the appearance of duality dissolves, 
Returning to the source from whence it arose. 

& With nothing left to see, 
Awareness gazes upon itself ...

Merging with itself
& Coming home to itself ...

The true Self is revealed.

& I find myself resting 
In the sublime knowing 
That separation has only ever been an illusion.

For there have never been two.
